allow: Bash(# Look at the app.js in the extracted asar for IPC server setup grep -n ""ipc\\|IPC\\|server\\|port\\|listen\\|websocket\\|WebSocket\\|ws://"" /tmp/pencil-asar/out/app.js)

Bash(git -C /home/frc/flakes commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve lg-gram build warnings and use remote mihomo-cli

Switch mihomo-cli input from local path to github:fanrongchao/mihomocli,
replace deprecated pkgs.system with pkgs.stdenv.hostPlatform.system,
rename xorg.setxkbmap to setxkbmap, and update home-manager to match
nixpkgs 26.05.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /home/frc/flakes commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
lg-gram: remove k3s compute cluster control plane

The etcd member address mismatch was causing k3s to hang on startup,
blocking nixos-rebuild switch.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(DISPLAY=:0 bash -c 'echo -n ""剪贴板直接粘贴ABC一二三"" | xclip -selection clipboard && xdotool key --window 56623118 --clearmodifiers ctrl+v')
Bash(DISPLAY=:0 bash -c 'echo -n ""焦点粘贴测试ABC一二三"" | xclip -selection clipboard && xdotool windowfocus 56623118 && sleep 0.15 && xdotool key --clearmodifiers ctrl+v')
Bash(DISPLAY=:0 bash -c 'echo -n ""测试"" | xclip -selection clipboard && xclip -selection clipboard -o')
Bash(DISPLAY=:0 bash -c 'echo -n ""kitty远程粘贴测试ABC一二三"" | xclip -selection clipboard && kitty @ paste')
Bash(DISPLAY=:0 bash -c 'echo -n ""中键粘贴测试ABC一二三"" | xclip -selection primary && xdotool windowfocus 56623118 && sleep 0.15 && xdotool click --window 56623118 2')
Bash(DISPLAY=:0 bash -c 'echo -n ""窗口键粘贴测试ABC123"" | xclip -selection clipboard && xdotool windowfocus 56623118 && sleep 0.15 && xdotool key --window 56623118 --clearmodifiers ctrl+shift+v')

Bash(DISPLAY=:0 bash -c '
echo -n ""精确粘贴测试XYZ"" | xclip -selection clipboard
xclip -selection clipboard -o
echo """"
echo ""clipboard set, now pasting...""
xdotool windowfocus 56623118
sleep 0.15
xdotool key --window 56623118 --clearmodifiers ctrl+shift+v
echo ""done""
')
